Students and Parents, As we transition form traditional learning and into what we now call Remote Learning, please go to the following site for information regarding this change....

From Susie Kliewer Coordinator/Parent Educator Marion County Parents as TeachersHello, friends,
In this challenging time, when we wonder when life will be back to the "old normal," you may...

Students and Parents, Here is the link to Centre USD 397 Remote Learning Platform! https://sites.google.com/usd397.com/chsremotelearningsite/home Students & parents please get familiar with the site, classes resume remotely on Monday, March 30th.

Tonight at Bud Peterson Field the football lights will be turned on at 8:20 pm to honor Centre's Seniors class of 2020. The lights will be on for 20 minutes and 20 seconds! Centre will do this every Friday night until May 15!
